name: Linecore
description:
We create websites and mobile apps that enable you to communicate your strategic vision, strengthen your brand, and win more business.
Our clients are industry leaders and raising stars. They know the power of innovations, they are experts, and want to work with experts.
Through our 15-year history, we helped over 300 clients, and have more than 100 projects in ongoing support.
We proudly use industry leading processes and tools to deliver business value across multiple industries. Contact us today to discuss your project.
